channel.title: Can't access hidden services from windows workstation
channel.description: Any idea why i cant access hidden tor urls from my windows 7 workstation ? I don't change anything, in the past this worked for me, but now i can only browse clearnet, can't access .onion

item.title: Can't access hidden services from windows workstation
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

What hypervisor are you using? Did you verify that non of the settings changed? Did you try restarting Tor?

Have a nice day,

Ego

item.title: Can't access hidden services from windows workstation
item.dc:creator: win
item.description:
Everything is setup like in documentation, gateway works fine. Also this setup worked for me many times before, now i try again and it don’t work. Maybe something is changed in whonix-gateway ?
